mapper.insert: insert into user_practice (id, user_id, practice_name, practice_date, result, comment, term) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{practiceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{practiceDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user_practice set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, practice_name = #{practiceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, practice_date = #{practiceDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, term = #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, practice_name, practice_date, result, comment, term from user_practice
